Class Passenger

java.lang.Object
  SimObject
      Passenger

public class Passenger
extends SimObject

Represents a passenger in an elevator Simulation. A passenger has a starting floor where they enter the simulation and a target floor where they wish to exit the simulation. The passenger keeps track of how long it has been in the simulation, waiting to be delivered to it's target floor

Nested Class Summary
static class Passenger.MaxFloor
          Compares two passengers by target floor, where passenger P1 is considered greater than passenger P2 if P1.targetFloor > P2.targetFloor.
static class Passenger.MinFloor
          Compares two passengers by target floor, where passenger P1 is considered greater than passenger P2 if P1.targetFloor < P2.targetFloor.

          The amount of time the passenger has spent in the simulation
